testcase.name: test_01
testcase.error:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Don't know how to encode { "userName": "automation", "password": "Automation@!@123" } as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
